verses.verse: Now Solomon<WH8010> purposed<WH559> to build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for the name<WH8034> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and a house<WH1004> for his kingdom.<WH4438>

Solomon<WH8010> counted out<WH5608> seventy<WH7657> thousand<WH505> men<WH376> to bear burdens,<WH5449> and eighty<WH8084> thousand<WH505> men who were stone cutters<WH2672> in the mountains,<WH2022> and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> to oversee them.<WH5329>

Solomon<WH8010> sent<WH7971> to Huram<WH2361> the king<WH4428> of Tyre,<WH6865> saying,<WH559> "As you dealt<WH6213> with David<WH1732> my father,<WH1> and sent<WH7971> him cedars<WH730> to build<WH1129> him a house<WH1004> in which to dwell,<WH3427> so deal with me.

Behold,<WH1129> I am about to build a house<WH1004> for the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> my God,<WH430> to dedicate<WH6942> it to him,<WH6999> and to burn before<WH6440> him incense<WH7004> of sweet<WH5561> spices,<WH8548> and for the continual show bread,<WH4635> and for the burnt offerings<WH5930> morning<WH1242> and evening,<WH6153> on the Sabbaths,<WH7676> and on the new moons,<WH2320> and on the set feasts<WH4150> of Yahweh<WH3068> our God.<WH430> This is an ordinance forever<WH5769> to Israel.<WH3478>
"The house<WH1004> which I build<WH1129> is great;<WH1419> for our God<WH430> is great<WH1419> above all gods.<WH430>

But who is able<WH6113> to build<WH1129> him a house,<WH1004> since heaven<WH8064> and the heaven<WH8064> of heavens<WH8064> can't<WH3557> contain him?<WH1129> who am I then, that I should build him a house,<WH1004> except<WH518> just to burn incense<WH6999> before him?<WH6440>

"Now therefore send<WH7971> me a man<WH376> skillful<WH2450> to work<WH6213> in gold,<WH2091> and in silver,<WH3701> and in brass,<WH5178> and in iron,<WH1270> and in purple,<WH710> and crimson,<WH3758> and blue,<WH8504> and who knows how<WH3045> to engrave<WH6605> engravings,<WH2450> to be with the skillful men who are with me in Judah<WH3063> and in Jerusalem,<WH3389> whom David<WH1732> my father<WH1> provided.<WH3559>

"Send<WH7971> me also cedar<WH730> trees,<WH6086> fir trees,<WH1265> and algum trees,<WH418> out of Lebanon;<WH3844> for I know<WH3045> that your servants<WH5650> know<WH3045> how to cut<WH3772> timber<WH6086> in Lebanon:<WH3844> and behold,<WH5650> my servants shall be with your servants,<WH5650>
even to prepare<WH3559> me timber<WH6086> in abundance;<WH7230> for the house<WH1004> which I am about to build<WH1129> shall be great<WH1419> and wonderful.<WH6381>

Behold,<WH5414> I will give to your servants,<WH5650> the cutters<WH2404> who cut<WH3772> timber,<WH6086> twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> measures<WH3734> of beaten<WH4347> wheat,<WH2406> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> measures<WH3734> of barley,<WH8184> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> baths<WH1324> of wine,<WH3196> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> baths<WH1324> of oil.<WH8081>"

Then Huram<WH2361> the king<WH4428> of Tyre<WH6865> answered<WH559> in writing,<WH3791> which he sent<WH7971> to Solomon,<WH8010> "Because Yahweh<WH3068> loves<WH160> his people,<WH5971> he has made<WH5414> you king over them.<WH4428>"

Huram<WH2361> continued,<WH559> "Blessed<WH1288> be Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> that made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth,<WH776> who has given<WH5414> to David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> a wise<WH2450> son,<WH1121> endowed<WH3045> with discretion<WH7922> and understanding,<WH2450> that should build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for Yahweh,<WH3068> and a house<WH1004> for his kingdom.<WH4438>
Now I have sent<WH7971> a skillful<WH2450> man,<WH376> endowed<WH3045> with understanding,<WH998> of Huram<WH2361> my father<WH1>'s,

the son<WH1121> of a woman<WH802> of the daughters<WH1323> of Dan;<WH1835> and his father<WH1> was a man<WH376> of Tyre,<WH6876> skillful<WH3045> to work<WH6213> in gold,<WH2091> and in silver,<WH3701> in brass,<WH5178> in iron,<WH1270> in stone,<WH68> and in timber,<WH6086> in purple,<WH713> in blue,<WH8504> and in fine linen,<WH948> and in crimson,<WH3758> also to engrave<WH6605> any kind of engraving,<WH6603> and to devise<WH2803> any device;<WH4284> that there may be a place<WH5414> appointed to him with your skillful men,<WH2450> and with the skillful men<WH2450> of my lord<WH113> David<WH1732> your father.<WH1>
"Now therefore the wheat<WH2406> and the barley,<WH8184> the oil<WH8081> and the wine,<WH3196> which my lord<WH113> has spoken<WH559> of,<WH7971> let him send to his servants:<WH5650>

and we will cut<WH3772> wood<WH6086> out of Lebanon,<WH3844> as much as you shall need;<WH6878> and we will bring<WH935> it to you in floats<WH7513> by sea<WH3220> to Joppa;<WH3305> and you shall carry it up<WH5927> to Jerusalem.<WH3389>"

Solomon<WH8010> numbered<WH5608> all the foreigners<WH582> who were in the land<WH776> of Israel,<WH3478> after<WH310> the numbering<WH5610> with which David<WH1732> his father<WH1> had numbered<WH5608> them;<WH4672> and they were found one hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> - three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> six<WH8337> hundred.<WH3967>

He set<WH6213> seventy<WH7657> thousand<WH505> of them to bear burdens,<WH5449> and eighty<WH8084> thousand<WH505> who were stone cutters<WH2672> in the mountains,<WH2022> and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> overseers<WH5329> to set<WH5647> the people<WH5971> at work.<WH5647>
